title: Happy Birthday, Karin!
detail_text: <:th_ch0108/>Karin~! Happy Birthday!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Thank you, Mari-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Today, we’re celebrating your fabulous birthday in one of my hotels, Karin~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Eh!? I’m happy but, if I leave now I don’t know if I would be able to come back in time…. Our dorm has a curfew, so<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>No problem! Mari has thought that over♪ Look, the giant bird came to pick us up….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>This sound…. It can’t be….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Yes, a helicopter! With this, you’ll be back in a flash! We’ve also specially decorated the insides of the heli for today♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>This is the first time I’ve had a birthday surprise like this!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>So, you’re coming, right, Karin?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Fufu, gladly! I’ve been wanting to visit one of your hotels at least once, Mari-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>I’ve prepared a special oceanfront room with lots of fruits! Let’s hurry, Karin! Time is money!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
